LongDescription: A medical facility combined with a triage center, operating as both a crew casualty station and a staging post for medical teams to heal wounded crewmembers.
FlavorText:
You might ask yourself why having a triage facility in the most hostile environment ever traveled would be a good idea. Of course, you're more likely to be sucked out into the Black or turned into fine mist by a railgun round than to take a light wound.

But the real killer is shrapnel and space debris, killing through utter attrition as a battle goes on longer and longer. Crewmen can't be replaced, but they can be saved, and that's why I have respect for those who work in the triage teams. I don't want to imagine what a Mace torpedo could do to the crew inside a Raines or similar.

- S. Ace, CWO
